Type.Name: TextChangedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TextChangedHandler(object o, TextChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed TextChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the TextChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the TextChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the TextChangedHandler is removed from the event.
